At the top, the status bar displays the time as 8:16, along with icons that indicate battery life, signal strength, and a Wi-Fi connection. The centered date widget reads "Tue, Aug 23". There's a dock at the bottom containing four app icons: Phone, Messages, Google Play, and Camera, which offer quick access to their respective functions. Lastly, a Google search bar sits at the very bottom, just above the navigation bar which includes a back button, home button, and a recent apps button.
